dao.name: QRY_QRY_MASTER_RF
dao.statement: select a.athena_id, a.hotel_cod, a.master_nos, a.master_typ, a.master_sta, a.cust_cod, a.deposit_nos, a.ins_dat, a.ins_usr, a.upd_dat, a.upd_usr,b.alt_nam,c.show_cod,c.cust_nam from master_rf a left join deposit_mn b on b.athena_id = :athena_id and b.deposit_nos = a.deposit_nos left join cust_mn c on c.athena_id= :athena_id and c.cust_cod = a.cust_cod where a.athena_id = :athena_id and a.hotel_cod = :athena_id

dao.name: QRY_SINGLE_QRY_MASTER_RF
dao.statement: select a.athena_id, a.hotel_cod, a.master_nos, a.master_typ, a.master_sta, a.cust_cod, a.deposit_nos, a.ins_dat, a.ins_usr, a.upd_dat, a.upd_usr,b.alt_nam,c.show_cod,c.cust_nam from master_rf a left join deposit_mn b on b.athena_id = :athena_id and b.deposit_nos = a.deposit_nos left join cust_mn c on c.athena_id= :athena_id and c.cust_cod = a.cust_cod where a.athena_id = :athena_id and a.hotel_cod = :athena_id and a.master_nos = :master_nos
